entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016
